name: Dice Launcher
description:
Blast enemies with a roll of the dice! Stop them from reaching your side of the table by launching explosive dice.

PLEASE READ THE CONTROLS BELOW BEFORE PLAYING

Made for and submitted to the GMTK Game Jam 2022

Controls:

Left click or Z: Roll d6

Middle click or X: Roll d4

Right click or C: Roll d12

Use mouse to aim

Note from the Developer:

I had a very busy weekend! I had no time on Sunday and I wasted Monday on an idea that didn't pan out, so I'm proud of how fast I was able to make this. I think the final result was a fairly fun minigame!
